trans-unit.source: Provides information about a user's capabilities to view and modify personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者的檢視及修改個人化資料能力的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: At various points in the life cycle of a Web Parts application, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object needs to check the capabilities of the current user to determine what personalization data the user can view and modify.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件應用程式生命週期中的各個點上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>需要檢查目前使用者的功能，來判斷哪些個人化資料，使用者可以檢視和修改物件。

trans-unit.source: When this need arises, the personalization object checks instances of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class.
trans-unit.target: 個人化物件時就會發生這項需求，會檢查執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>類別。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts personalization feature defines two user capabilities, each of which is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> object.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件個人化的功能定義兩個使用者功能，其中每一個都由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>物件。

trans-unit.source: Both of these objects have corresponding verbs that can be used to specify user capabilities within the `<authorization>` section of a Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 這些物件都有對應的動詞命令，可以用來指定使用者功能內`<authorization>`Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [authorization Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[個人化的 web 組件 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的授權項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434)。

trans-unit.source: The different user capabilities are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中，會顯示不同的使用者功能。

trans-unit.source: User capability
trans-unit.target: 使用者功能

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the current user can save personalization data to the data store.
trans-unit.target: 指出目前的使用者，可以將個人化資料儲存到資料存放區。

trans-unit.source: Accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> field on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object.
trans-unit.target: 透過存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the current user can enter Shared personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: 指出目前的使用者可以輸入共用個人化範圍。

trans-unit.source: Accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability> field on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object.
trans-unit.target: 透過存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability>欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class has one public property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>類別有一個公用屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A> property indicates the name of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A>屬性會指出類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class also has two exposed methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>類別也有兩個公開的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A> method allows two user capability objects to be compared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A>方法可讓要比較的兩個使用者功能物件。

trans-unit.source: The objects are considered equal if they have the same name.
trans-unit.target: 物件可視為相等，如果具有相同的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A> method generates a hash code based on the name of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A>方法會產生名稱為基礎的雜湊碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>物件。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a name for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" />.
trans-unit.target: 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> object, or has the same <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> 物件，或有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> or has the same <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> 值，或有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> 值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name" /> 屬性的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string value identifying the class.
trans-unit.target: 取得識別類別的字串值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that identifies the class.
trans-unit.target: 識別類別的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。
